verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>Speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, There shall <S%H3808>none<s%> be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> for the <S%H5315>dead<s%> among his people: <S%H5971><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> for his <S%H7607>kin,<s%> that is <S%H7138>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, that is, for his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and for his <S%H1>father,<s%> and for his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and for his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and for his <S%H251>brother,<s%>

And for his <S%H269>sister<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> that is <S%H7138>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H834>which<s%> hath <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>husband;<s%> for her may he be <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>
But he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> defile <S%H2930>himself,<s%> being a chief <S%H1167>man<s%> among his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to profane <S%H2490>himself.<s%>

They shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7139>make<s%> <S%H7144>baldness<s%> upon their <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they shave <S%H1548>off<s%> the <S%H6285>corner<s%> of their <S%H2206>beard,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8295>make<s%> any <S%H8296>cuttings<s%> in their <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

They shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H853><s%> the offerings of the LORD made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> and the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of their <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> do <S%H7126>offer:<s%> therefore they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

They shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> that is a <S%H2181>whore,<s%> or <S%H2491>profane;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> put <S%H1644>away<s%> from her <S%H4480>husband:<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto his <S%H430>God.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him therefore; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H7126>offereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of thy <S%H430>God:<s%> he shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> you, am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> she profane <S%H2490>herself<s%> by playing the <S%H2181>whore,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H2490>profaneth<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H1>father:<s%> she shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And he that is the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> among his <S%H4480>brethren,<s%> <S%H251><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> was <S%H3332>poured,<s%> and that is <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H899>garments,<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6544>uncover<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6533>rend<s%> his <S%H899>clothes;<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>body,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> defile <S%H2930>himself<s%> for his <S%H1>father,<s%> or for his <S%H517>mother;<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of his <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H5145>crown<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> him: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> in her <S%H1331>virginity.<s%>

A <S%H490>widow,<s%> or a divorced <S%H1644>woman,<s%> or <S%H2491>profane,<s%> or a <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of his own <S%H4480>people<s%> <S%H5971><s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he <S%H2490>profane<s%> his <S%H2233>seed<s%> among his <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H376>Whosoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he be of thy <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> in their <S%H1755>generations<s%> that <S%H1961>hath<s%> any <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> let him <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7126>approach<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> he be <S%H834>that<s%> hath a <S%H3971>blemish,<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7126>approach:<s%> a <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H6455>lame,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> he that hath a flat <S%H2763>nose,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> any thing <S%H8311>superfluous,<s%>
Or <S%H176><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H7667>broken-footed,<s%> <S%H7272><s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7667>broken-handed,<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> <S%H1384>crookbacked,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H1851>dwarf,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that hath a <S%H8400>blemish<s%> in his <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> be <S%H1618>scurvy,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3217>scabbed,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> hath his <S%H810>stones<s%> <S%H4790>broken;<s%>

No <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> hath a <S%H3971>blemish<s%> of the <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the offerings of the LORD made by <S%H801>fire:<s%> <S%H3068><s%> he hath a <S%H3971>blemish;<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>
He shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God,<s%> both of the most <S%H4480>holy,<s%> <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> come <S%H5066>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath a <S%H3971>blemish;<s%> that he <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuaries:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> it <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
